roleset.name: make pinging noises
roleset.note: PING-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ping' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.2, Framenet entry Motion noise. (from ping.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pachinko
example.text: Devotees pass hours, watching the lights blink and listening to the metal balls ping, as much to gamble as to get a little time to be anonymous, alone with their thoughts.
